forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco greets its residents with an embrace of soft sunlight intermixed with the wispy tendrils of marine layer that cling persistently to the edges of the city. The forecast hints at a day that will remain mostly sunny, with temperatures striving to reach the cool height of 62 degrees. A gentle west-southwest wind stirs, offering a refreshing touch as it weaves its way through the streets, where gusts may momentarily catch a passerby off guard. Tonight, a partial veil of clouds will gently descend, promising a slight chill as the temperature settles around 52 degrees. 

Despite the occasional shroud of fog hanging about the famous Golden Gate Bridge and parts of the bay, the overall atmosphere remains inviting. It is a day best suited for layering—perhaps a light sweater over a short-sleeved shirt, accompanied by comfortable shoes for wandering through the local streets. The wonders of this city beckon: an afternoon stroll through one of its many parks, a leisurely coffee in an outdoor café, or a visit to an art gallery would align beautifully with the crisp yet sunny ambiance. The weather, ever dynamic yet invitingly consistent, plays its own role in the charm of San Francisco living.
